deposit().details: Emits LoopRequested for Reactive Network to orchestrate loops

executeLoopStep(address).details: Called by Reactive Network callback proxy

executeUnwind(address).details: Called by Reactive Network or directly

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

deposit().notice: Deposit ETH and start leveraged looping

executeLoopStep(address).notice: Execute one loop step: borrow -> swap -> supply

executeUnwind(address).notice: Execute safe unwind: withdraw -> swap -> repay -> repeat

requestUnwind().notice: Request safe unwind of leveraged position
